title: Charming Brownstone in Popular Walking Neighborhood near CCF
neighborhood: Cleveland Heights near the hospitals and University
posting_body: Prime Building in a Prime Location of Coventry Village!
Old world charm found in a brownstone walk-up with high ceilings.
Spacious one bedroom suite has hardwood floors throughout with high ceilings.
Dining room is open to the Living Room separated by an archway.
Bathroom has floor-to-ceiling marble with a jetted tub.
Kitchen has new cabinetry, new granite countertops, dishwasher , disposal and built-in microwave.
Ceiling fans in Dining Room and Living Room provide for great circulation.
Living room has a huge storage closet.
Exterior stairs has landing for outdoor space.
Located in a convenient walking neighborhood.

Literally a few second walk  to groceries, banks, library, coffee shop (free wi-fi), sports bars, sandwich shops, pizza shop, frozen yogurt parlor, video store, yoga studio, hair salon, drycleaners, bookstore, drug store, music store, nostalgic toy store, hardware store, clothing store, flower shop, sports bar, clubs with live music, and 21 restaurants including outdoor dining.

Close to the Cleveland Clinic Foundation, Lerner College of Medicine, Case Medical School,  Case Dental School, Huron Road Hospital, VA Hospital, Metro General Hospital, Hillcrest Hospital, Ahuja Hospital and University Hospital.
Case Western Reserve University, Case Law School, Cleveland State University, and John Carroll University.
